name: The Lord of the Rings: Adventure Card Game
summary: Build a deck of iconic heroes and challenge the forces of Sauron in this thrilling tactical card game. Travel through famous locations, complete story-driven quests and forge a new legend of Middle-earth on your own or with a friend in cooperative mode. But beware: the Eye of Sauron is searching for you.
info:
• 发行: Asmodee Digital
  • 别名: The Lord of the Rings: Adventure Card Game - Definitive Edition
  • 别名: 指环王：冒险卡牌游戏
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: Card game
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 2019-08-29
  • 官方网站: https://www.asmodee-digital.com/en/lord-rings-adventure-card-game/
  • 开发: Fantasy Flight Interactive
